Articles.Content:
**A short 5 minute video of the a lost kerbal crash landing at the inland KSC. He stumbles upon a kerbal still alive at the site and gets the Kerbal-X rocket out of the hangar, the one that Jebediah thought wouldn't explode and blasted off to the sky! After making it to space, they chose to go farther. Not Duna, Not Eve, Not Eeloo, Not Moho. Not Dres, But Laythe at Jool. Will they make it or will interplanetary transfer fail...**

---Edit---

OH AND My sound card is dead, so if there is any problems with sounds, like loud noises. TELL ME. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/x82z6G84u68?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
